one.block.eosiojavaandroidkeystoresignatureprovider

Class EosioAndroidKeyStoreUtility

  • one.block.eosiojavaandroidkeystoresignatureprovider.EosioAndroidKeyStoreUtility

  • public class EosioAndroidKeyStoreUtility

    Utility class provides cryptographic methods to manage keys in the AndroidKeyStore provider and use the keys to sign transactions.

    • Method Detail

      • generateAndroidKeyStoreKey

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static java.lang.String generateAndroidKeyStoreKey(@NotNull
                                                                               android.security.keystore.KeyGenParameterSpec keyGenParameterSpec)

        Generate a new key inside AndroidKeyStore by the given keyGenParameterSpec and return the new key in EOS format

        The given keyGenParameterSpec is the parameter specification to generate new key, identity of the key could be set with it. This spec has to follow:

        • KeyGenParameterSpec must includes KeyProperties.PURPOSE_SIGN

        • KeyGenParameterSpec.getAlgorithmParameterSpec must be ECGenParameterSpec

        • KeyGenParameterSpec.getAlgorithmParameterSpec's curve name must be SECP256R1_CURVE_NAME

        See Also:
        keyGenParameterSpec, keyGenParameterSpec, KeyGenParameterSpec, KeyProperties.PURPOSE_SIGN, KeyGenParameterSpec.getAlgorithmParameterSpec, ECGenParameterSpec, KeyGenParameterSpec.getAlgorithmParameterSpec

      • generateAndroidKeyStoreKey

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static java.lang.String generateAndroidKeyStoreKey(@NotNull
                                                                               java.lang.String alias)

        Generate a new key inside AndroidKeyStore by the given alias and return the new key in EOS format

        The given alias is the identity of the key. The new key will be generated with the Default KeyGenParameterSpec from the generateDefaultKeyGenParameterSpecBuilder

        See Also:
        alias, alias, KeyGenParameterSpec

      • convertAndroidKeyStorePublicKeyToEOSFormat

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static java.lang.String convertAndroidKeyStorePublicKeyToEOSFormat(@NotNull
                                                                                               java.security.interfaces.ECPublicKey androidECPublicKey)

        Convert ECPublic Key (SECP256R1) that reside in AndroidKeyStore to EOS format

        Parameters:
        androidECPublicKey - ECPublicKey - the ECPublic Key (SECP256R1) to convert
        Returns:
        String - EOS format of the input key

      • getAllAndroidKeyStoreKeysInEOSFormat

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static java.util.List<kotlin.Pair> getAllAndroidKeyStoreKeysInEOSFormat(@Nullable
                                                                                                    java.security.KeyStore.ProtectionParameter password,
                                                                                                    @Nullable
                                                                                                    java.security.KeyStore.LoadStoreParameter loadStoreParameter)

        Get all key (SECP256R1) in EOS format inside AndroidKeyStore

        Parameters:
        password - KeyStore.ProtectionParameter? - the password to load all the key
        loadStoreParameter - KeyStore.LoadStoreParameter? - the KeyStore Parameter to load the KeyStore instance
        Returns:
        List - List of SECP256R1 keys inside AndroidKeyStore

      • getAndroidKeyStoreKeyInEOSFormat

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static java.lang.String getAndroidKeyStoreKeyInEOSFormat(@NotNull
                                                                                     java.lang.String alias,
                                                                                     @Nullable
                                                                                     java.security.KeyStore.ProtectionParameter password,
                                                                                     @Nullable
                                                                                     java.security.KeyStore.LoadStoreParameter loadStoreParameter)

        Get all keys (SECP256R1) in EOS format inside AndroidKeyStore

        Parameters:
        alias - String - the key's identity
        password - KeyStore.ProtectionParameter? - the password to load all the key
        loadStoreParameter - KeyStore.LoadStoreParameter? - the KeyStore Parameter to load the KeyStore instance
        Returns:
        String - the SECP256R1 key in AndroidKeyStore

      • sign

        @JvmStatic
 @Nullable
public static kotlin.Array[] sign(@NotNull
                                                        kotlin.Array[] data,
                                                        @NotNull
                                                        java.lang.String alias,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        java.security.KeyStore.ProtectionParameter password,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        java.security.KeyStore.LoadStoreParameter loadStoreParameter)

        Sign data with a key in the keystore.

        Parameters:
        data - ByteArray - data to be signed
        alias - String - identity of the key to be used for signing
        password - KeyStore.ProtectionParameter - password of the key
        Returns:
        Binary version of the signature
        Throws:
        AndroidKeyStoreSigningError

        Parameters:

        Throws:
